page.title: 02Settlement-Llanhari area
page.content: The area surveyed by our school consists of the villages of Llanhari and Pontyclun together with parts of Llanharan and Talbot Green.Since the implementation of boundary changes in 1985,most of the area surveyed lies within the communities of Llanhari and Pontyclun.In 1981 the community of Llanhari had a population of 2550 and the community of Pontyclun had a population of 4090.The M4 motorway runs through the southern half of the area surveyed and the main London- South Wales railway line crosses the area from north-west to south-east. Data was collected by three schools, Ysgol Gyfun Llanhari, Llanhari Primary School and Pontyclun Primary School. Pages 1-11 were written by pupils from Ysgol Gyfun Llanhari,12-15 were produced by Llanhari Primary School and 16-20 by Pontyclun Primary School.
